data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: Do you think that volunteer community service should be required for all young people? Why or why not?
data.answer: I think voluntary community service should be required for all young people for two reasons. Firstly, young people need to gain more practical experiences, and participating in community services is a good way for them to get fresh experiences. Secondly, it provides youngsters opportunities to meet new people and make friends. As a result, they can take advantage of this opportunity to broaden their social circle.
